verses.roman:
śuni' ānandita haila sabākāra mana
sabe āsi' sārvabhaume kaila nivedana

synonyms: śuni'-hearing; ānandita—happy; haila—were; sabākāra—of everyone; mana—the minds; sabe āsi'—everyone coming; sārvabhaume—unto Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; kaila—did; nivedana—submission.
translation: Hearing of the Lord's return, everyone became very happy, and they all went to Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya and spoke to him as follows.
